freesmartphone.org Framework DBus Interface Specification

org.freesmartphone.Network.Provider

Description

The Network interface provides access to connection provider registration.

Namespace

org.freesmartphone.Network.Provider

Methods

  • RegisterProvider
  • UnregisterProvider
  • ConnectionStatus

Signals

None

Errors

None

Methods

RegisterProvider ( oa{sv} )

Description: Register a connection provider. The connection provider must implement the Connection interface.

Parameters

o: path

The object path providing Connection

a{sv}: capabilities

The capabilities for this connection provider.

UnregisterProvider ( o )

Description: Stop sharing the internet connection of this device with any clients connected to the specified network interface via DHCP.

Might stop a dhcp server process and adjust IP tables.

Parameters

o: path

The capabilities.

ConnectionStatus ( osa{ss} )

Description: Update the connection status for a given connection.

Parameters

o: path

The object path providing Connection

s: status

The connection status. Expected values are:

  • available: The connection has become available.
  • connecting: The connection is being established.
  • online: The connection is online.
  • disconnecting: The connection is being shut down.
  • offline: The connection is offline.
  • unavailable: The connection has become unavailable.

a{ss}: properties

Optional properties as key/value pairs of type 'string'. Expected keys are:
